environment

Class Coordinates

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.Coordinates

  • public class Coordinates
extends java.lang.Object
    represents a bi-dimensional coordinate. x and y are set at construction time and cannot be changed later.

    • Constructor Summary

        public Algorithms.action getTransitionAction(Coordinates other)
